dinner.name: In-flight meal
dinner.notes: Meals provided on long-haul international flight

breakfast.name: Botanica Restaurant
breakfast.notes: Hotel breakfast buffet, available 6:30-10:00 AM weekdays. Interactive restaurant with city views and local touches.

lunch.name: Hotel restaurant or nearby cafe
lunch.notes: Jet lag recovery day - keep it light and simple near hotel

dinner.name: 半山腰火锅 (Banshanyao Hot Pot)
dinner.location: Chongqing hillside location with city view
dinner.notes: REQUIRED: Hotpot restaurant with spectacular city views. Alternative: Pipa Yuan (world's largest hotpot restaurant) with unbeatable night views, or SHUA Sky Terrace at Raffles with Forbidden City walls view.

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast
breakfast.notes: Early breakfast before 7 AM high-speed rail departure

lunch.name: Family meal
lunch.location: Bazhong family home, 半山逸城A区35幢1902
lunch.notes: Lunch with family after arrival in Bazhong

dinner.name: Family reunion dinner
dinner.notes: Chinese New Year Eve celebration dinner with family

breakfast.name: 老五酱肉包子 (Laowu Braised Meat Baozi)
breakfast.notes: REQUIRED: Most authentic braised meat steamed buns in Bazhong. Local specialty breakfast spot.

lunch.name: 老七牛肉 (Lao Qi Beef)
lunch.notes: REQUIRED: Famous Bazhong beef restaurant. Eat before afternoon high-speed rail departure (~13:00-14:00).

dinner.name: Taikoo Li restaurant
dinner.notes: Dinner while exploring Taikoo Li shopping area in the evening

breakfast.name: Panda Panoramic Restaurant
breakfast.location: Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding
breakfast.notes: Early breakfast at panda base (arrive 9 AM sharp). Floor-to-ceiling windows with panda views. Alternative: Panda Time Cafe for coffee and pastries.

lunch.name: 明婷饭店 (Ming Ting Restaurant)
lunch.location: 26-6 Wai Cao Jia Alley, Chengdu (near Ma'annan Road)
lunch.notes: REQUIRED OPTION 1: Michelin Bib Gourmand restaurant. Famous for tofu and brains (豆腐脑花). Price ~60 RMB per person. Hours 11:00-21:00. Located down an alleyway - authentic苍蝇馆子 style.

dinner.name: 饕林 (Tao Lin) or 牛丞丞和牛 buffet
dinner.location: Wuhouci Street No. 3, Annex 1 or Chunxi Road area
dinner.notes: REQUIRED OPTIONS 2-3: Tao Lin (饕林) - modernized Sichuan cuisine near Wu Hou Shrine, not just spicy mala style. Tel: 028-85250252. Alternative: Wangniu Sukiyaki Wagyu Buffet on Chunxi Road with M8 wagyu and macarons. Eat before airport departure (14:35 flight).

breakfast.name: Xing Hua Lou
breakfast.location: No 719 East Nanjing Road, Huangpu District
breakfast.notes: Historic restaurant from 1851, near hotel. Famous for traditional breakfast experience and flavors.

lunch.name: Bund area restaurant
lunch.notes: Lunch while exploring Bund and People's Square area

dinner.name: 人和馆 (Ren He Guan) or Ajiya or Michelin restaurant
dinner.location: 407 Zhaojiabang Rd, Xuhui (人和馆) or 4/F 1333 Huaihai Zhong Lu (Ajiya)
dinner.cuisine: Shanghainese 本帮菜 or Japanese yakiniku or French fine dining
dinner.notes: REQUIRED OPTIONS: 人和馆 - Michelin One Star (2021-2025), authentic Shanghainese cuisine, famous for crab roe rice and pork belly stew. Tel: +86 21 6403 0731. AJIYA - Japanese BBQ with 21 beef cuts (39-139 RMB/plate), cheap drinks (25 RMB beer). MICHELIN: L'Atelier de Joël Robuchon (2-star, The Bund) or 8½ Otto e Mezzo Bombana (2-star, Rockbund) or Wujie (1-star vegetarian, The Bund).

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast
breakfast.notes: Early breakfast before Shanghai Disney visit

lunch.name: Tangled Tree Tavern
lunch.notes: Most recommended restaurant in Shanghai Disneyland. Eat before 11:30 AM or after 1:30 PM to avoid lines. Other options: Mickey and Friends Cafe (Xiao Long Bao, mala noodles), Royal Banquet Hall.

dinner.name: Aurora Restaurant or Disneytown
dinner.notes: Aurora offers fine dining with fireworks view at 8 PM (501-1000 RMB). Alternative: Ippudo Ramen or Cheesecake Factory in Disneytown.

breakfast.name: Yechun Teahouse
breakfast.notes: Centuries-old brand. Must-try: Five-Diced Steamed Bun, Crab-roe Soup Dumpling, Multi-Layer Oil Cake. Traditional breakfast experience.

lunch.name: Cafe near bookstore or shopping area
lunch.location: Shanghai French Concession or Jing'an area
lunch.notes: Light lunch while exploring indie bookstores, coffee shops, and designer boutiques

dinner.name: Puxi area restaurant
dinner.notes: Dinner near shopping and cultural exploration areas

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast or 张师傅早餐店
breakfast.notes: Early breakfast before 9:05 AM flight. Zhang Shifu Breakfast Shop is affordable and tasty local option.

lunch.name: Airport or Beijing quick meal
lunch.location: Shanghai Pudong Airport or Beijing Daxing Airport
lunch.notes: Flight 09:05-11:25, need to check in to hotel and prepare for afternoon university registration

dinner.name: Pre-theater quick meal
dinner.notes: Quick dinner before evening dance drama performance 《只此青绿》

breakfast.name: Hotel breakfast
breakfast.notes: Breakfast before university orientation and moving day

lunch.name: University cafeteria or nearby
lunch.notes: Lunch during orientation day, likely near campus

dinner.name: Meizhou Dongpo Restaurant
dinner.location: 2/F Zhongguancun Mansion, No. 27 Zhongguancun Street, Haidian
dinner.notes: Zhongguancun branch, ~100 RMB per person. Good Sichuan option near university area.

breakfast.name: Rental apartment or local breakfast
breakfast.notes: Breakfast at or near rental apartment before Forbidden City visit

lunch.name: Siji Minfu Roast Duck
lunch.location: 11 Nanchizi Street (near Forbidden City east gate)
lunch.notes: Best itinerary: Forbidden City 9 AM, lunch at Siji Minfu 12:30 PM. Window seats overlook Forbidden City walls (3-min walk from east gate). Half-duck 259 RMB. Use WeChat mini-program for advance queue (cuts wait from 120 to 15-20 min). Famous for authentic Peking duck.

dinner.name: Nanluoguxiang area restaurant
dinner.notes: Dinner while exploring Nanluoguxiang or 798 Art District area

breakfast.name: Local breakfast spot
breakfast.notes: Breakfast before couple photography session (avoid Tue/Wed/Thu)

lunch.location: Photography studio area or central Beijing

lunch.name: Da Dong
lunch.notes: Famous for healthier duck with less fat/oil. Super thin, silky pancakes. VIP duck available with special diet for extra flavor. Alternative upscale option to Siji Minfu.

dinner.name: Chili's Beijing
dinner.location: 02, 2/F East Area, Zhongguancun Art Park, Haidian
dinner.notes: First Beijing Chili's location (opened Dec 2024). Burgers, fajitas, ribs, margaritas. Near Haidian Huangzhuang Station (Lines 4/10). Hours: Sun-Thu 11am-11pm, Fri-Sat 11am-midnight.

dinner.name: Spice Spirit
dinner.location: 4F Xinzhongguan Shopping Mall, No. 19 Zhongguancun Street, Haidian

breakfast.name: Local breakfast or Tianjin breakfast
breakfast.notes: If Tianjin day trip: try traditional Tianjin breakfast (狗不理包子 Goubuli Baozi). Otherwise Beijing breakfast.

lunch.name: Tianjin specialty or Beijing restaurant
lunch.notes: If Tianjin: try Tianjin specialties like jianbing guozi, ear-hole fried cake. Otherwise Beijing lunch.

dinner.name: Haidilao Hotpot
dinner.location: Zhongjun World City branch or other Beijing location
dinner.notes: Famous hotpot chain with excellent service. Zhongjun World City branch is world's first unmanned hotpot restaurant managed by robots. Fun experience for couple.

lunch.name: Beijing restaurant
lunch.notes: Lunch during final Beijing exploration

dinner.name: Quanjude
dinner.notes: Legendary Peking duck restaurant since 1864, served imperial families during Qing Dynasty. Historic experience for final Beijing dinner. Traditional and famous choice.

notes: All specific user-requested restaurants included: 半山腰火锅 (Day 1 Chongqing dinner with city view), 老五酱肉包子 (Day 3 Bazhong breakfast), 老七牛肉 (Day 3 Bazhong lunch), 明婷饭店 (Day 4 Chengdu lunch option), 饕林 (Day 4 Chengdu dinner option), 牛丞丞和牛 (Day 4 Chengdu dinner option), 人和馆 (Day 5 Shanghai Michelin dinner option), ajiya (Day 5 Shanghai Japanese yakiniku dinner option). Costs are estimated per person in USD. Reservations recommended for Michelin restaurants (人和馆, L'Atelier de Joël Robuchon, 8½ Otto e Mezzo Bombana) and popular spots (Siji Minfu - use WeChat for advance queue). Budget-conscious options included for Beijing days when girlfriend is busy. Mix of authentic local cuisine and international options for INFJ preferences. Day 6 Shanghai Disney dining focused on best-rated in-park options.
